category: Obstructing or impeding the flow of an inland water
description: At all times during the life of the impounding works, the Licence Holder shall release water from the <<lake/pond/reservoir>>, created by the works so as to maintain a flow of <<no less than>> <<instantaneous flow rate>> in the <<water body name>> <<immediately downstream of / within <<distance>> metres downstream of the works/ at National Grid Reference/shown marked as XX on the map/referred to in condition X>>. This flow shall be known as the Compensation Flow.
